channel.title: Npc help..again >.>
channel.description: So i have custom npcs i want to add. 1 of them occasionally lands a 2 but doesnt have a motion. The other one does the same thing except it has a motion. I looked in the NPC handler and theres nothing there for them. Where would it be?

item.title: Npc help..again >.>
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Add them to your server[as in just making them spawn…] or adding them to your client in general, to spawn at a later date?.. be more specific…

But
ADDING TO SERVER
try autospawn.cfg(i think that is the file with the spawning stuff in it, but I’m a bit rusty)

Read full topic
